org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.datanode

Class DNConf

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.datanode.DNConf

  • @InterfaceAudience.Private
public class DNConf
extends Object
    Simple class encapsulating all of the configuration that the DataNode loads at startup time.

      Returns true if encryption enabled for DataTransferProtocol.

      Returns encryption algorithm configured for DataTransferProtocol, or null if not configured.

      Returns true if configuration is set to skip checking for proper port configuration in a secured cluster.

      • getIgnoreSecurePortsForTesting

        public boolean getIgnoreSecurePortsForTesting()
        Returns true if configuration is set to skip checking for proper port configuration in a secured cluster. This is only intended for use in dev testing.
        Returns:
        true if configured to skip checking secured port configuration
